SpyTools.name: Chimera
SpyTools.description: Hold it close for unexpected protection. Grants one-time protection against effects from other users.

SpyTools.name: Spy Briefcase
SpyTools.description: Discreetly siphon 30% of another member's points.

SpyTools.name: Key Chain Sheep
SpyTools.description: Assigns a random role to the targeted member. Setup: `...q_roles <@mention role1> <@mention role2>...`

SpyTools.name: Mute Muffler
SpyTools.description: Silences the target user for 30 minutes.

SpyTools.name: Motion Alarm
SpyTools.description: Single-use alarm triggers a 20-minute timeout if the target sends any emoji (checks last 10 messages).
